ygData.subject: RE: Gm event
ygData.msgSnippet: He said he was looting... could he have picked it up off his victims? John ... From:	MFerrulo@aol.com [SMTP:MFerrulo@aol.com] Sent:	Thursday, August 05, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
He said he was looting... could he have picked it up off his victims?
John

-----Original Message-----
From: MFerrulo@... [SMTP:MFerrulo@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 4:18 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Gob Pets in Oasis?

From: MFerrulo@...

In a message dated 8/5/99 4:04:26 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
DDiina@... writes:

<<
Speaking of GM organized events....the other day on my server
(Xegony) a GM
took over the Tae Archeon in Cazic Thule.....he was a lvl 50 Wizard
and was
casting Ice Comet.....he killed everybody...no one lost any exp
though which
was cool....the GM did finally fall to a Lvl 50 Mage named Hast who
hangs
out in CT actually helping people!!! That's right a lvl 50 who
helps
people.....anyways Hast told me he got a FULL set of rubicite
armor and a
shiny mettalic robe off the GM controlled Tae Archeon.....WOW is
all I could
say >>

Why did the GM Wizard have rubicite armor? Can Wizards can't wear
that stuff
and lvl 50 or not a Wizard would never have the strength to carry it
around
in inventory. This seems bizarre

Wizaro Wrathcaster
Solusek Ro
